scripts.initial-files: mkdir app src && cd app && mkdir css js && cd .. && cd src && mkdir components && touch app.styl index.jade index.js
scripts.compile:finance: jade src/views/Financas/index.jade -P -o components/Financas/ && stylus src/components/Cards/* -o components/Financas/finance.css
scripts.compile:customer: jade src/views/Customer/index.jade -P -o components/Customer/ && stylus src/components/Table/* -o components/Customer/customer.css
